snoopy.blindnote: (20100610末安)genomic positionを確認した,accession Noを加えた,evidence,snoRNAbaseがアクセスできないため未確認。 (20100617末安)genomic positionを更新した,evidenceをsnoRNAbaseを参考に加えた。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss, A. M., Jady, B. E., Bertrand, E., and Kiss, T. (2004). Human box H/ACA pseudouridylation guide RNA machinery. Mol. Cell .Biol. 24, 5797-5807, Shibata, H., Ro-Choi, T. S., Reddy, R., Choi, Y. C., Henning, D., and Busch, H. (1975). The primary nucleotide sequence of nuclear U-2 ribonucleic acid. The 5'-terminal portion of the molecule. J Biol Chem, 250, 3909-3920.
